name: Viber World Poker Club
description:
DOWNLOAD VIBER WORLD POKER CLUB FOR FREE!

The multi-million player social poker is now available on Viber! Find yourself in the world of bets, stakes, and huge winnings! Play your favorite poker games – Texas Hold ‘Em and Omaha. Compete in weekly tournaments and show millions of other players that you’re the best poker player out there!

Features:
- Texas Hold ‘Em and Omaha Poker
- Free chips and other bonuses
- Play with your Viber friends!
- Weekly tournaments
- Sit-N-Go tournaments
- Gifts, awards, and more!

GO ALL IN! DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE!
